title: T206 Overall Polar Bear for sale

posts.post_title: T206 Overall Polar Bear for sale
posts.post_content:
Attractive PSA 3. $old delivered. Check or money order only. New York residents must add sales tax. Please communicate via [url]email-edhans@monkberry.com[/url]. Offering 10% off orders on my updated website [URL="http://t206.monkberry.com/t206.html"]http://t206.monkberry.com/t206.html[/URL] over $100 until December 10th. As always, "I'll take it" takes precedence over ongoing negotiations, requests for additional information, etc. Thank you for looking.

[IMG]http://www.monkberry.com/~edhans/t206ove54.jpg[/IMG]
That's a nice card congrats to the new owner.
